content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a case between two parties referred to as lo and oi lo filed a lawsuit demanding the division of joint property and oi filed a counterclaim for the same the court decided to dismiss the claim and counterclaim partially and divide the common property between lo and oi they listed the specific items that each party will keep as their sole property the court also awarded financial compensation to oi in the amount of 2902 euros and 50 cents the costs of the proceedings will be borne by both parties the court decision can be appealed within 30 days the court heard arguments regarding the ownership and value of various items such as a welding machine an iphone furniture and a car the court made determinations based on evidence and sales advertisements the court also considered the division of a limited company and the division of money accumulated during the marriage the court made a judgment and determined the amount of procedural costs which will be borne by both parties

metadata.cost: Each party covers own procedural costs, unspecified amounts
